  1. edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.model

Uses of Package
edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.model

Packages that use edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.model
Package
Description
edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld
 
edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.controller
This package manipulates the game model in a (nearly) user-interface-agnostic manner.
edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.model
This package contains several classes that represent the game state, e.g., the game map, items, and the player.
edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.persistence
This package's purpose is to create and load game data files.
edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.textui
This package contains classes that support the construction of text-based user interfaces.
edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.textui.parser
This package contains the logic to "parse" or understand what the user types into the game.
  • Classes in edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.model used by edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld
    Class
    Description
    IWorldObserver
    A class can implement this interface when it wants to be informed of changes in World objects.
    World
    The simulated world in which simulated players lead their short, simulated lives.

    Description
    Direction
    This class defines an enumerated type for the directions by which Locations are related and Characters can move.

    A class can implement this interface when it wants to be informed of changes in World objects.

    Represents a place, such as a room or corridor, that a character in the game can travel through.

    An avatar that is controlled by, and represents, the user of the game.
